daily.text: If we don’t live in the same vibe, it is hard to be aware of each other. When our reading differs from our neighbors’ reality, our surroundings may take a range of discordant shades and daily episodes become unrecognizable. But if we endeavor to find out, the “who is who”, the “what is what” and the “where is Waldo”, we might demonstrate our social literacy and connectedness. ('Fish for silence.').
daily.author: Erik Pevernagie

daily.text: The grace and mercy by which you are not arrested for not paying your daily oxygen bills, is the grace that is sufficient to take you through successfully. It's the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ. Enjoy it!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: Exercise, prayer, and meditation are examples of calming rituals. They have been shown to induce a happier mood and provide a positive pathway through life's daily frustrations.
daily.author: Chuck Norris

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: We designed a car that is for daily commutes and that you charge every day. The less you use the gasoline engine, the better mpg. Essentially, the Karma can achieve dramatic savings and low CO2 output when used as intended, as a daily commuter.
daily.author: Henrik Fisker

daily.text: The gift of the moments and its lessons prepares us for a better tomorrow.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: So many of us are causing pain and suffering to ourselves on daily basis, because we do not know the value of life.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: They're still advertising the added health-giving advantages of vitamins in your daily diet, although it has long since been shown that you'd be better off eating Smarties.
daily.author: Terry Wogan

daily.text: The good news is that you are alive. The essential thing is that you must live.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: Great hopes make everything great possible.
daily.author: Benjamin Franklin

daily.text: Circumvent negative influences, circumstances and people.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: There are problems and there are problems. One big problem and a great paradox in the arena of life is the problem of where or how a person is now and where or how he wants to be tomorrow. Had it not been this problem, we would have been relaxing all day long.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: Every day is a dance deed.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: Our daily prayer ought to be: Please universe, help me help myself and help me show others how to help themselves.
daily.author: Kamand Kojouri

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: May God grant us grace for our daily work.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: It's through a leader's actions - what he or she does and says on a daily basis - that the essence of great leadership becomes apparent.
daily.author: Travis Bradberry

daily.text: I had parents who believed I could do anything - and I know how that made me feel. I think both my parents, having careers in the medical profession, feel they are helping people on a daily basis, and that was inculcated in me as a value. I had to struggle with giving up the idea of becoming a doctor myself.
daily.author: Reese Witherspoon

daily.text: If you want to leave your footprints on the sands of time, be sure you’re wearing work shoes.
daily.author: Unknown

daily.text: The failure of the nation lies in the failure of its citizens.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: I keep going backas if I'm looking for something I have lostback to the motherland, sisterland, fatherlandback to the beacon, the breastthe smell and taste of the breeze,and the singing of the rain.
wanderlust.author: Heather Nova

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: Will I ever get over the pull I feel to both of these places?
wanderlust.author: Sara Ferguson

wanderlust.text: I hope you know that you are not alone, and in those hours when you feel that you are, just know there are other people out there — singing the same melodies of wanderlust, climbing over mountains in the dark, and waking in the night to stare at the moon, thinking of this large world and dreaming — just like you.
wanderlust.author: Apex

wanderlust.text: The geographical pilgrimage is the symbolic acting out an inner journey. The inner journey is the interpolation of the meanings and signs of the outer pilgrimage. One can have one without the other. It is best to have both.
wanderlust.author: Thomas Merton

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: Travel is life-changing. That's the promise made by a thousand websites and magazines, by philosophers and writers down the ages. Mark Twain said it was fatal to prejudice, and Thomas Jefferson said it made you wise. Anais Nin observed that 'we travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.' It's all true. Self-transformation is what I sought and what I found.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: Alone in the car with my social life all before and behind me, I was suspended in the beautiful solitude of the open road, in a kind of introspection that only outdoor space generates, for inside and outside are more intertwined than the usual distinctions allow. The emotion stirred by the landscape is piercing, a joy close to pain when the blue is deepest on the horizon or the clouds are doing those spectacular fleeting things so much easier to recall than to describe.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: I am a world of uncertainties disguised as a girl.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: A wave of saudade swept over me as I realized home never existed at all. The concept of home felt far from my reach, and I felt sick with longing.
wanderlust.author: M.B. Dallocchio

wanderlust.text: It is so gratifying to tell so many stories my eye can romance with, that I become the stories.They shall live on after me, and in that way it makes me immortal.
wanderlust.author: Deejay Kapil

wanderlust.text: We are all pilgrims who seek Italy.
wanderlust.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wanderlust.text: I dont live in a fantasy; just a dream, that's to hard for some to believe.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: The fear of rape puts many women in their place - indoors, intimidated, dependent yet again on material barriers and protectors... I was advised to stay indoors at night, to wear baggy clothes, to cover or cut my hair, to try to look like a man, to move someplace more expensive, to take taxis, to buy a car, to move in groups, to get a man to escort me—all modern versions of Greek walls and Assyrian veils, all asserting it was my responsibility to control my own and men's behavior rather than society's to ensure my freedom. I realized that many women had been so successfully socialized to know their place that they had chosen more conservative, gregarious lives without realizing why. The very desire to walk alone had been extinguished in them—but it had not in me.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: Life's trials will test you, and shape you, but don’t let them change who you are.”~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Without struggle, success has no value.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Summer is leaving silently. Much like a traveler approaching the end of an amazing journey.
wanderlust.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

wanderlust.text: All night, after the exhausting games of canasta, we would look over the immense sea, full of white-flecked and green reflections, the two of us leaning side by side on the railing, each of us far away, flying in his own aircraft to the stratospheric regions of his own dreams. There we understood that our vocation, our true vocation, was to move for eternity along the roads and seas of the world. Always curious, looking into everything that came before our eyes, sniffing out each corner but only ever faintly--not setting down roots in any land or staying long enough to see the substratum of things the outer limits would suffice.
wanderlust.author: Ernesto Che Guevara

wanderlust.text: What is a Wanderess? Bound by no boundaries, contained by no countries, tamed by no time, she is the force of nature’s course.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: It's time to change my life and see the world.
wanderlust.author: Jennifer Coletta

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: And if travel is like love, it is, in the end, mostly because it’s a heightened state of awareness, in which we are mindful, receptive, in dimmed by familiarity and ready to be transformed. That is why the best trips, like the best love affairs, never really end.
wanderlust.author: Pico Iyer

wanderlust.text: Everytime I share Jesus Christ, I feel like a superhero!
wanderlust.author: Jane Bulos

motivational.text: Make dance the mission every moment seeks to accomplish.
motivational.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

motivational.text: Within us all are sages, warriors and fools; we more often that not choose the fools.
motivational.author: rassool jibraeel snyman

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?
motivational.author: Steve Maraboli

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: You are where you are and what you are because of yourself, nothing else. Nature is neutral. Nature doesn't care. If you do what other successful people do, you will enjoy the same results and rewards that they do. And if you don't, you won't.
motivational.author: Brian Tracy

motivational.text: Responsibility and duty are different things, you can sacrifice your responsibility for your duty but you cannot sacrifice your duty for your responsibility.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: Make a little effort to give up your insignificant quarrels and eventually a better world will follow.
motivational.author: Abhijit Naskar

motivational.text: You gotta make it a priority to make your priorities a priority.
motivational.author: Richie Norton

motivational.text: The outcome is not up to you. The outlook is.
motivational.author: Germany Kent

motivational.text: I would rather aim high and miss the mark than low and make it.
motivational.author: Auliq Ice

motivational.text: Some individuals have the courage to make it, even feel the need to do so; for them the quest is a necessity, not an option. Most people setting out on such journeys are never heard from again, but part of the romance of any field lies in keeping the dream alive, in not settling for what is familiar and comfortable.
motivational.author: Gino Segrè

motivational.text: Happy Mind, Happy Home.
motivational.author: Napa Kettle

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: Are you using your time to time God or you are working on God's timing? Don't ask God for the gift of Patience and you tell him you need it now. (A bit deep).
motivational.author: Patience Johnson

motivational.text: Death is not considerate, or fair.
motivational.author: Compton Gage

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: Self-liberation is the greatest victory.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: The treasure of a lifetime lies in the sacredness of the heart.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: Seals:The Five Cosmic Seals are five occult Level 333, 666, 999, 1330 and 003 operating 400,000 minuet mystical degrees.
motivational.author: Compton Gage

love.text: How many loved your moments of glad grace,  And loved your beauty with love false or true;  But one man loved the pilgrim soul in you, And loved the sorrows of your changing face.
love.author: W.B. Yeats

love.text: She had been lost on her own and I had been lost on my own, so it was natural that once we found each other we wanted to keep being unlost with each other. But that, at heart, had made us exist.
love.author: David Levithan

love.text: You don’t have to want to be in arelationship for a little bow-chicka-bow-wow.
love.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: I'd rather be not the light in your lifeThe bright day might make me obscureI'd rather be the cold darknessFor it remains, unseen, uncertain and unsure.
love.author: Sanhita Baruah

love.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: If a rainbow makes a sound, or a flower as it grows, that was the sound of her laughter.
love.author: William Paul Young

love.text: The actual secret to success: Be a better friend today than you were yesterday.
love.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

love.text: I'd love to do a romantic comedy. And perhaps, if the character was right and I had a good gut instinct, a Bollywood movie. And I'd love to direct. One day. I'm learning a lot on the set of 'The Good Wife.'.
love.author: Archie Panjabi

love.text: Love or not to loveWhen question ariseLove or not to loveAlways love.When question arise Be or not to beAlways be. When question ariseBelieve or not to believeAlways believe. When question ariseHelp or not to helpAlways help. When question ariseHope or not to hopeAlways hope. When question arise Dream or not to dream Always dream. Always keep hope aliveAlways dream with trust.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: Look for the heart in a man before you look at what he has.
love.author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

love.text: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
love.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

love.text: A half-open window.Morning-fresh air carriescurious sunlight into a bedroom.Flecks of dust shimmer yellow-gold.Four feet, entwined under white sheets.Joni's Blue, on the player.Delicate curtains slow-danceto Sunday's tune.Laughter.Talk of: what for breakfast?Anything. Anything at all.
love.author: Nick Miller

love.text: As you can see marriage is about putting away selfishness and taking on the concept of teamwork.
love.author: Jim George

love.text: Just becauseyou feel lostdoesn't meanthat you are.Sometimes youjust have to relax,breathe deep,and trust the pathyou're on.
love.author: Lalah Delia

love.text: When love is pure, it has the power to conquer. Lover and beloved conquer each other by their affection. The source, the essence, the fullest manifestation of love's conquering power is the love of the soul for the supreme soul, or God.
love.author: Radhanath Swami

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: For an outpour of love there is always a first partaker.
love.author: Sunday Adelaja

love.text: The more you trust, the greater the betrayal. The more you love, the greater the harm.
love.author: Unknown

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: The world is such a wonderful place to wander throughWhen you've got someone you love to wander along with you.
love.author: Man on the man

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: The heavens raped from our misuse of love.
love.author: A.P. Sweet

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: I can’t control my feelings, but I’m learning to have a say in how much my feelings control me.
happiness.author: Scott Stabile

happiness.text: There is no fortitude like patience, just as there is no destructive emotion worse than hatred.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: While filling color to someone's life to whom you really love & care, make sure to fill little color of joy & happiness which should not hurt the beauty of their life. Don't prove that you are an artist just express your art, that's the love and life is...
happiness.author: Navnath Godse

happiness.text: Inner peace is a sacred blessing.
happiness.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

happiness.text: In the success equation, subtraction comes before multiplication or addition. You must sow before you can reap a harvest.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: We are born into this precious human existence to achieve the uni cation of opposites and become enlightened, or liberated, from the illusion of separation.
happiness.author: Dashama Konah Gordon

happiness.text: Happy Mind, Happy Home.
happiness.author: Napa Kettle

happiness.text: Anger and resentment are the cancer of our mind. To be cured, inject love in your heart and be kind.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: We are all actors in life. Some act like they won’t amount to much while others do the opposite. You have a choice.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: Faith is the leverage we need to liberate us from the shackles of unbelief.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: Let me eat the love and digest it.Let me love the flower and beautify it.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: I love you as the moon loves the nightto show her charm, beauty and magic of light.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Seals:The Five Cosmic Seals are five occult Level 333, 666, 999, 1330 and 003 operating 400,000 minuet mystical degrees.
happiness.author: Compton Gage

happiness.text: I wanted to freeze this moment forever, the chimes, the slight splash of the water, the chink of the dogs’ leashes, laughter from the pool, the skritch of my mother’s dip-pen, the smell of the trees, the stillness. I wished I could shut it in a locket to wear around my neck. I wished a sleep would find us, at this absolute second, like sleep over the castle of sleeping beauty.
happiness.author: Janet Fitch

happiness.text: Talk happiness. The world is sad enough without your woe. No path is wholly rough.
happiness.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

happiness.text: But what was there to say?Only that there were tears. Only that Quietness and Emptiness fitted together like stacked spoons. Only that there was a snuffling in the hollows at the base of a lovely throat. Only that a hard honey-colored shoulder had a semicircle of teethmarks on it. Only that they held each other close, long after it was over. Only that what they shared that night was not happiness, but hideous grief.Only that once again they broke the Love Laws. That lay down who should be loved. And how. And how much.
happiness.author: Arundhati Roy

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: When you become addict in to MATERIAL things in life then the TRUE natural life start to run away from you, YES! It's can give you certain pleasure in the society but in the same time it will sabotage your true HAPPINESS of life which we could have simply with GRATITUDE and FORGIVENESS.
happiness.author: Rashedur Ryan Rahman

happiness.text: Christmas united us as holy beings. We experience love, joy and peace.
happiness.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

happiness.text: Do you believe in other universes? Do you think there's another dimension where we're happy?
happiness.author: Jasmine Warga

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

positive.text: The key thing about force protection is... If you focus too much on force protection, and you disengage yourself from the community, you're putting yourself at greater risk because you need to interact with the community in a positive way to gain the intelligence you need.
positive.author: H. R. McMaster

positive.text: The confidence which we have in ourselves gives birth to much of that which we have in others.
positive.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

positive.text: All our final resolutions are made in a state of mind which is not going to last.
positive.author: Marcel Proust

positive.text: When you become addict in to MATERIAL things in life then the TRUE natural life start to run away from you, YES! It's can give you certain pleasure in the society but in the same time it will sabotage your true HAPPINESS of life which we could have simply with GRATITUDE and FORGIVENESS.
positive.author: Rashedur Ryan Rahman

positive.text: Innovation! One cannot be forever innovating. I want to create classics.
positive.author: Coco Chanel

positive.text: Don't let anyone or anything to dull your sparkle.
positive.author: Pradeepa Pandiyan

positive.text: In all spheres of life, there are constraints. You have to develop your own strategy to overcome each constraint.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Most females are dissatisfied with how they look and battle with countless insecurities, not realizing that you look most beautiful when you think you don’t. I wish that women and girls all over the world knew just how uniquely beautiful that we ALL are. Loving yourself for who YOU are is empowering! There’s great freedom in being unbothered by other people’s opinion of you.
positive.author: Stephanie Lahart

positive.text: Put on your lips success creeds every day. Never see yourself as an unworthy being, incapable of receiving good gifts from God.
positive.author: Israelmore Ayivor

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Start dream building. Bring your goals into the real world. Imagine yourself at your best. Transform yourself with dedication and work to achieve excellence.
positive.author: Mark F. LaMoure

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: When one door of happiness closes  another opens  but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
positive.author: Helen Keller

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: We can transform our lives by renewal of our mind.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Life is great with positive outlook on life.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: I think the media can be a very positive influence by essentially holding people to task about the importance of high quality medical care. And when the media is scrutinizing you, then I think that's a very good, positive thing for the field of medicine.
positive.author: Anthony Fauci

positive.text: My heart had been a darkened room for so very long, but then you found the light switch.
positive.author: John Mark Green

positive.text: My size is a huge part of me. You just have to appreciate those kinds of things. So I wasn't born with long legs - who cares. You just have to embrace it. Being body positive is really important to your overall happiness.
positive.author: Sabrina Carpenter

positive.text: Inner peace is a sacred blessing.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: If in the last few years you haven't discarded a major opinion or acquired a new one  check your pulse. You may be dead.
positive.author: Gelett Burgess

positive.text: We have now under President Obama's leadership had 29 months in a row of private sector job growth. That stretch of positive private sector job growth hasn't happened since 2005. We still have a long way to go, but we are moving in the right direction.
positive.author: Martin O'Malley

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The mind is its own place  and in itself can make a heaven of hell  a hell of heaven.
positive.author: John Milton

strength.text: Dreams give the strength to live life.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: Theres a remarkable amount of strength residing in those who move forward without being able to physically move. Ones that carry the weight of illness or a disability, they battle wars most know nothing about. They are the true warriors of the world, the ones who have every reason to quit but never do.
strength.author: Nikki Rowe

strength.text: A single minded vision gives strength of purpose.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Without an anchor, we can be drifted to any shore. May you find hope as anchor.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: The “right time’ is now. Go onward and fulfill your dream.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: A man with wisdom will always have a solution no matter how big his challenges may be. Wisdom makes you a problem solver.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: These times are hard, but I won't walk away jaded, darker, different. I feel. I cry to heal. If you saw me in those moments, maybe you'd think I was a mess. But I don't call it a mess. I call it strength.Real strength isn't about building walls. Real strength is about staying open, no matter what. It's about taking life—with all the pleasures that fade and all the pain that sticks around for too long—and not shutting down, not closing down, not building up those walls.Resilience isn't hard, impenetrable, iron. Resilience is flexible, soft, warm. Stay strong. The real kind of strong. Don't let your automatic mind reflexes make you jump away from pain and towards pleasure. Make choices. See clearly. And never, ever, stop feeling.Don't go numb. The world, even with all its horror, is too beautiful to miss.
strength.author: Vironika Tugaleva

strength.text: Trolls must continually feed their bottomless need, so be strong and patiently wait out their fires of hatred for eventually they eat their own.
strength.author: L.M. Fields

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: When two persons are together, two of them must not whisper to each other, without letting the third hear; because it would hurt him.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: May God grant you more grace, strength and wisdom.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: She would figure out how to get what she wanted, what she needed, even when her long lashes failed to convince, when her body was no longer young and beautiful. She'd be more than pretty, She'd be strong.
strength.author: Kass Morgan

strength.text: The weak may not be admired and hero-worshipped; but they are by no means disliked or shunned; and they never seem to have the least difficulty in marrying people who are too good for them. They may fail in emergencies; but life is not one long emergency: it is mostly a string of situations for which no exceptional strength is needed, and with which even rather weak people can cope if they have a stronger partner to help them out.
strength.author: George Bernard Shaw

strength.text: Having ascended to some spiritual strength by focusing on the power of the feminine, it is no doubt tempting to wield this strength against that which triggers memories of having once been weaker.
strength.author: Thomm Quackenbush

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: Your suffering is here to help you unfold and to awaken into compassion, love and strength.
strength.author: Bryant McGill

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: Life has moments that feel as if the sun has blackened to tar and the entire world turned to ice.  It feels as if Hades and his vile demons have risen from the depths of Tartarus solely for the purpose of banding to personally torture you, and that their genuine intent of mental, emotional, and spiritual anguish is tearing you to shreds.  Your heart weighs as heavily as leaden legs which you would drag yourself forward with if not for the quicksand that pulls you down inch by inch, paralyzing your will and threatening oblivion.  And all the while fire and brimstone pour from the sky, pelting only you.  Truly, that is what it feels like. But that feeling is a trial that won't last forever.  Never give up.
strength.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

strength.text: When the fuel is dried up in a vehicle, it stops driving automatically. You are a vehicle in the spiritual and the physical world, so you need some oil for alacrity, in order to get to your destination. The greater the quantity of your oil, the more you cover the distance, and the more you cover the distance, the closer you get to your success.
strength.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

strength.text: You cannot occupy a proper place on earth without wisdom. It is the principal thing you must have.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: That I’ve horrified many flight attendants across the globe with my oft-thought morbid ritual of listening to Tuesday’s Gone as we fly through the sky is not my concern. My declaration evident, my truth now burns: there is no preordained destiny to battle, I thumb my nose at fate. I am a warrior. The rules don’t apply.
strength.author: Ava Ayers

strength.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
strength.author: Marcus Aurelius

strength.text: The Storms of This LifeWatching the distant clouds building and growing forevermoreThe harsh wind begins rushing thru the leaves with the branches bending to and froIn the attempts to not give in again I'm standing firm on all that I knowAnd extending out my hand reaching beyond the heavens aboveGrasping for His strength to hold on, along with the endurance to make it thruPraying that the ground beneath me will not erode nor engulf all that I love.
strength.author: Christine Upton
